description:
All collections need to be sorted by created_at desc.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Paginated_Collections-d1e664.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Collection Sorting

comments.content:
All collections need to be sorted by created_at desc.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Paginated_Collections-d1e664.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: After looking into it more, servers and images are already sorted by create time. Since those are the only paginated collections we care about (in the OSAPI), I think this bug report is invalid.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
